segments.text: I have a suggestion . Why don't we go to a ETV and sing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A ETV ? Are you serious ? ETV ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , why not ? Don ’ t you like ETV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I never went to one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Many Americans have never gone to a ETV . It ’ s not an American thing to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there are a lot of Kts in this town . There's one just two blocks from here .
segments.speaker: S1
